comment: Cannot make cysteine from homocysteine and also make homocysteine from cysteine.

Cysteine biosynthesis via the reverse transsulfuration pathway requires homocysteine, which is an intermediate in methionine biosynthesis. Homocysteine is also an intermediate in the S-adenosylmethionine cycle, so many organisms that cannot synthesize methionine can convert it to homocysteine.
